channel.title: Shell on htr3n's
channel.link:
https://htr3n.github.io/tags/shell/Recent content in Shell on htr3n'sHugo -- gohugo.ioenThis work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.Mon, 23 Jul 2018 00:00:00 +0000 Faster and enjoyable ZSH (maybe)https://htr3n.github.io/2018/07/faster-zsh/Mon, 23 Jul 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2018/07/faster-zsh/

Z shell (Zsh) has been my shell of choice in both Linux and macOS. I used to install oh-my-zsh or the claimed-to-be-faster Prezto or Zim to leverage some of their cool libraries.
